text: National Lampoon's Animal House is a 1978 American comedy movie directed by John Landis and written by Ivan Reitman. It stars John Belushi, Peter Riegert, Tim Matheson, John Vernon, Kevin Bacon, Donald Sutherland, Bruce McGill, Tom Hulce, Karen Allen, Stephen Furst and it was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was spun off into the short lived TV series Delta House in 1979. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John Landis Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies set in Oregon Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: National Lampoon's Animal House
